summary: This adds the high level soul trap enchantment to Volendrung.
descriptionHtml:
This was made in response to a request.

It's all in the name. This adds the high level 20 second soul trap enchantment to Volendrung. This should be compatible with anything that doesn't change the "DA06VolendrungEnchantment" or whether or not the Volendrung uses that. If you have any issues, advice, complaints, requests, anything, please contact me. I love modding, this is my first upload. I happened to see it in the requests section of the forums, and did it real quickly.

The addition of a 3 second soul trap to Volendrung can also be found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24904//?

If you want me to go into depth with this and modify the enchantments of other weapons/armors, I would be happy to do so. PM me for better communication. I can update pretty quickly. So if you're in the middle of a quest, and you want a certain enchantment modification done right then, but lack the knowledge to do so. Check to see if I'm online. I could get any basic mod done quickly.

Also, if you like this, please endorse. I really want to know what people think of my work.

Check out my other mods here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/7172874/?tb=mods&pUp=1
author: MinisterTanner
